alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 01 at 1:31PM CST until December 02 at 4:25AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage For the Calcasieu River...including Salt Water Barrier...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Vermilion River...including Lafayette Surrey Street Gage... Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 430 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Vermilion River at Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, Minor flooding of Beaver Park and Vermilionville near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 PM CST Friday the stage was 11.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:15 PM CST Friday was 11.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 5.4 feet early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
